item.description:
I'm very new to archery, but I think that it's quite fun.

 

Would anyone like to join me at Trader Jan's for some shooting?  Don't worry if you're don't know anything about archery - you won't be far behind me.

 

You don't need any equipment - it's all included for $15/hr (I only intend to shoot for one hour).  It's a little tricky finding the entrance to Trader Jan's - the door is actually in the back of the building, and you'll have to take the elevator to the second floor.

 

I'm not making reservations, so I'm keeping the RSVP limit VERY small and disallowing guests.  Please do not sign up unless you *REALLY* think you're going to attend.

 

PLEASE REMEMBER to ask for arm guards when you get there.  They prevent painful bruises that some new shooters will get in their arms.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy with really short hair, or try my cell: 401-699-7304
item.name: Archery for n00bs!
